content:
CaptionButton Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of caption button to display.

In this Article

public enum CaptionButton
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
CaptionButton

Remarks

This enumeration is used by DrawCaptionButton.

Caption buttons are the system buttons usually found on the rightmost side of a form's title bar.

Fields

Close

A Close button.
Help

A Help button.
Maximize

A Maximize button.
Minimize

A Minimize button.
Restore

A Restore button.
